attributes.description: If you looking for quality Pre-Owned Vehicles no further.Our vehicles go through a i60-pont check quality check to ensure you are getting value for your money.Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.Delivery can be arranged nationwide.Price excludes admin and delivery fee.Finance can be arranged on premises and trade ins welcome.We at Motus ford Germiston strive for perfection,so every customer makes the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect car on our showroom floor.We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives,to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
